players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let any mafia members slip through our grasp."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks any further."
Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all work together to ensure the safety of our group. Let's try to build trust and communicate openly with each other during the day."

Diana: "I think we should all consider the possibility that Alice might be the mafia, given her silence during the first discussion round. It's important that we maintain open communication and trust within our group, so let's try to get more information from Alice to put our minds at ease."
You: "Charlie and Diana, I understand your concerns. I was silent because I was processing everything, but I assure you, I'm not the mafia. Let's focus on gathering more evidence together."
